Text:
Don't ask me about the file size. I simply rar'd it.


DON'T FORGET TO SEED FOR OTHER PEOPLE!

After you installed it, please tell me if it worked.
It's my first torrent, so...
It's working fine on Win7/64, but the game is in russian.
You could have mentioned that the menus are in Russian, apart from that, it does work with no viruses.

@alivepl

Try out the Game configuration. Usually under "Language Selection" you could choose an other language. If not, then it's crazy cuz I can play it on English, German, Spanish etc.

If you search it, the configurator is under:

"Ford Racing 2CONFIGsyscfg.exe"
I've tried that too, if you choose English the game is in russian.

Hm. That's weirdo.

Damn and I thought this one was perfect.

Well, on my PC it works perfectly. I don't know why it doesn't works for you. I have the excactly same version.
Fck man.

I delete this torrent, cause it's not working correctly. Maybe I'll upload the REAL version later.
c ya
